org.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class FunkSVDItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.lenskit.mf.svd.BiasedMFItemScorer
        • org.lenskit.mf.funksvd.FunkSVDItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class FunkSVDItemScorer
extends BiasedMFItemScorer

    Do recommendations and predictions based on SVD matrix factorization. This is simply a convenience class to make it easy to get a FunkSVD scorer; it specializes the biased MF scorer to require a FunkSVD model.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • FunkSVDItemScorer

        @Inject
public FunkSVDItemScorer(FunkSVDModel model,
                        @BaselineScorer
                        ItemScorer baseline,
                        @Nullable
                        PreferenceDomain dom)

        Construct the item scorer.

        Parameters:
        model - The model.
        baseline - The baseline scorer. Be very careful when configuring a different baseline at runtime than at model-build time; such a configuration is unlikely to perform well.
        dom - The preference domain.
